content.description: Start at the start for Mean Gene and friction traverse left into Hate Crime.  Smear your feet high and mantle onto the sloping ledge, press up into a hand foot match and reach up into good pockets above. Tops out at the top of Hate Crime.
content.protection: Multiple Pads and a spotter, bad landing.

content.description: Start low on pockets in the center of the southeast face of the boulder.  Pick your way up heavily pocketed steep face and top out.
content.location: Center of the southeast face just to the left of Guantanamo Bay.

content.description: Work your way straight up the steep slab making use of good friction, shallow ripples and a few sloper pockets to a high chicken head and deep pockets at the top.  Top out in the grove.
content.location: West side of the Detention Block about 7 feet to the right of Hate Crime.

content.description: Start at the base of the arete on the left.  Smear your right foot and mantle up into a hand foot match on the lower ledge.  Climb the arete to a sloping ledge,  mantel up and get a high foot and step up to deep pockets on the upper left corner of the west face and top out.
content.protection: Multiple pads and spotters, bad landing.
content.location: Aréte on the far left end of the west face of the boulder.

content.description: Good foot holds, good hand holds, but has some variety including vertical pinches for the beginning climber or a warm up for others. It's a little mossy on top.
content.location: It is the main vertical line of holes near the skinny tree

content.description: Start low on the pocketed face in the center of the southeast side of the boulder.  Move left onto a rail and continue up the steep face on small crimps to larger ledges near the top.  Pull through the ledges and negotiate the tricky top out.
content.location: Starts near the center of southeast face directly left of pickpocket.

content.description: Start on pockets on the right side of the southeast face. Continue up the steep face on shallow pockets, thin rails and slopey edges.
content.location: Locate near the right side of the southeast face to the right of Guantanamo Bay.

content.description: Large boulder located near the the far end of the Dam wall from the parking lot, boulder is right at the lake shore, part of the lake front boulders.
